name: Make your own slime! 💚
description: Did you know that it's really simple to make your own slime? Ask your family to make some slime together! Write about the texture and color of your slime with as much detail as possible.

name: Go on a bike or scooter ride 🚲
description: Hop on a bike and take a spin around the neighborhood with a helmet and if your parents say it's OK! How do you feel after a bike ride?

name: ✨  Write down your 5 best qualities ✨
description: There are so many wonderful things about yourself! Pick five things you especially love about what makes you, you.

name: Take a walk 🚶‍♀️
description: Notice all the different plants and trees as you walk. Write down the names of any that you recognize.

name: Write a thank you letter ✏️
description: What are some of the ways your grownups have helped you? Write a thank you card to your family! Appreciation is always appreciated!

name: Write about your favorite thing that you learned today 🧠
description: Did you learn about something in school, at home, or online today that really inspired or surprised you? Write about it!

name: Design a gif ✍️
description: Gifs are surprisingly fun and easy to make! Watch the video to learn how to create your own gif or you can use a different method you already know about. Write about what your gif looks like. How did you make it?

name: Practice Box-breathing meditation for 5 minutes 🕉
description: Find a quiet place to sit and get comfortable.  Inhale through your nose for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale through your mouth for 4, hold for 4 . . .Repeat. Write about how this made you feel. Did it help you relax? Would you consider trying this when stressed?

name: Use a sleep story to fall asleep 😴
description: Use a sleep story to fall asleep at night. Did it help you fall asleep faster? Write about your experience. Were there any techniques you picked up on you want to use regularly?

name: Get down with yoga 🙆‍♀️
description: Follow along with a yoga video online or try a variety of poses like Child's Pose, Downward Dog and Warrior. Yoga can boost self-esteem, strength, and flexibility! Take a moment to learn about yoga and some different exercises you can do to start your day. Write about a new routine you could use to start

name: Learn about recycling in your town ♻️
description: Find out how your town recycles paper, plastic, and glass. What did you learn? What are some ways you could be more conscious about how your family recycles?

name: Take a shorter shower than usual 🚿
description: Bathing is obviously an important of self care but we can help trim down our carbon footprint by being aware of how long we're in the shower. Write about all the ways you use water in your day-to-day life.

name: 🌲 Plant a tree 🌳
description: Watch this video to learn how to plant a tree! Write down the steps it takes, naming the parts of a tree along the way. Trees help clean the air we breathe and filter the water we drink. Write about what kind of tree you want to plant and how long it will take to grow.

name: Compliment 3 people today 🥰
description: Write down three compliments for three different people that you will share with them!

name: Smile at everyone you see today 😁
description: Did you know that smiling can actually make you feel better? Try smiling at everyone you make eye contact with today!

name: Tell someone why you love them 💖
description: Tell someone why you love them! Write down a few things you plan on telling your loved one.

name: Make your own planter 🌱
description: Use a sleep story to fall asleep at night. Write about

name: Meditate for 12 minutes 🕉
description: Meditation is scientifically proven to improve health, happiness and focus, as well as decrease stress. Follow along with the video and write about how the meditation made you feel. Do you feel more or less stressed?

name: Stand up and wiggle it out - from your head to your toes 💃
description: This is an easy one. Stand up and wiggle for 15 seconds or until you feel good! How did it feel to shake it out? What parts of your body did you stretch? Write about your experience.

name: Write about a win and a challenge you faced today 💯
description: It's good for an agent to know how they are feeling. Write down one thing that was hard today, and write down one thing that was good!

name: Create a bucket list 📝
description: What are some of the things you would love to do most? Make a list or write a story about places you want to travel, people you want to meet, foods you want to try - the options are limitless!

name: 📚 Create homemade bookmarks 📚
description: Grab some markers, packing tape, and a piece of printer paper. Cut the printer paper into 5 pieces and color them in with whatever designs you'd like. When you're done designing, sandwich the paper pieces between two pieces of packing tape then use scissors to cut off the excess tape.

name: Create paper jellyfish! 🐠
description: Create some fun paper jellyfish with some paint, scissors and paper bags! Take a picture of your masterpiece when you are done!

name: Build a rubber band guitar 🎸
description: For this task, you'll need a shoebox or tissue box and some rubber bands. Place the rubber bands around the cup and start strumming! Take a picture of your creation to fulfill this task!

name: Put together a jigsaw puzzle 🧩
description: Find a puzzle around the house or pick one online. Puzzles teach us a lot about concentration and problem-solving skills! Plus, it's pretty cool watching a bunch of little pieces come together to make a whole.

name: Learn to crochet 🧵
description: Get a crochet needle and some yarn and make something fun!

name: Make a handmade card for a friend 💌
description: Bust out a piece of pen and paper and make a thoughtful card to send to a friend via snail mail.

name: 🙅‍♀️ Cut out sugary beverages today🙅
description: Find a sugary snack in the pantry or a soda in the fridge. Take a picture of the nutrition label. How many grams of sugar does it have? Look at Sugars and Added Sugars.

name: Eat healthy a meal 🍅
description: Create a lunch or dinner that follows the My Plate plan - includes protein, fruit, vegetables, grains, and dairy.  Take a picture of your plate!

name: Go on a trash walk 🗑
description: When you are taking a walk bring a trash bag and collect trash to throw away when you get home. Take a picture of your good deed!

name: 👯‍♀️ Make your own plastic bag jumprope 👯
description: Does your family save plastic bags from the grocery store? Rip them apart and tie them together to make your very own jumprope! Try it out by jumping until you get tired.

name: Gather toys and clothes you don't use anymore to donate 👚🧸
description: It's important to give to others who are in need. Put the clothes and toys you are ready to donate in a box. Take a photo of your box when it's ready.

name: Put kind sticky notes all over your bathroom mirror 🙌
description: Give yourself some daily reminders to inspire yourself when your day begins. There are so many different things you could write! Maybe it's your favorite quote or just something about yourself that makes you smile. Take a picture of your mirror!

name: Write a thank you note and send it to your local fire or police station 👩‍🚒👨‍🏭
description: There are a lot of people in your city or town that work very hard to keep it safe. Show your appreciation by making a handmade thank you card!

name: Paint rocks and leave them places 🎨
description: Gather some rocks and paint them with pictures and words and then leave them places for people to find. Take a picture of your favorite rock art.

name: Make your own stress ball 🔮
description: All you need for this activity is some flour or corn starch, a balloon and a funnel. Start by stretching out the balloon, then stick the funnel in the opening and pour in the flour or corn starch. You may need to tap the sides of the funnel to help the flour move down the funnel. Start by stretching out the balloon, then stick the funnel in the opening and pour in the flour or corn starch. You may need to tap the sides of the funnel to help the flour move down the funnel. Once the balloon is filled with flour (it will not expand much), simply tie it. You may want to consider placing it inside another balloon to make the exterior stronger.

name: Create your own comfy reading nook 🛋 📖
description: Build a space in your home or room dedicated to reading. Build a fort or turn a giant box into a little nook and lay down some floor pillows and blankets to make it extra cozy.

name: ✨  Make your bedroom sparkle ✨
description: A secret agent needs to know where all their tools are. Let's make sure we know where all of our tools are by cleaning our room and taking a picture of it!

name: Draw a self portrait 🎨
description: Sit down with a pen and paper in front of a mirror and draw what you see. There are a lot of benefits that come with taking the time to draw ourselves! How can you include the things you value and your future goals in your drawing?

name: Solve a sudoku puzzle 🧩
description: Visit the website to get a printable sudoku puzzle to solve. All puzzles are great for boosting brain power, but did you know sudoku puzzles are especially great for improving memory? Take a picture of your completed puzzle to earn the points for this task!

name: Make a homemade puzzle 🧩
description: Draw a picture on a piece of paper then use scissors to cut it up into pieces. Put it back together or store the pieces together in a ziploc bag!

name: Bake a delicious treat 🧁
description: Watch the video to learn how to make cookies, or get creative and bake your own delicious treat!

name: Make your own sidewalk chalk ✍️
description: Eggshells contain calcium, the same material that makes chalk. Grind them up and mix them with flour, water, and food coloring to make your very own sidewalk chalk.

name: Float a dry erase marker drawing 🖊
description: Draw a picture with a dry erase marker on a plate or bowl. Pour water over your drawing and watch it rise off the surface! This works due to the insolubility of dry-erase marker ink in water, combined with the lighter density of the ink.

name: Clean coins 🪙
description: Put some vinegar & salt, coca cola, and water, in three different cups. Place coins in each of the cups. Which one do you think will work the best and why?

name: Make a paper airplane soar ✈️
description: Make the best paper airplane you can and take a photo of it!

name: Make giant bubbles out of dish soap ⚪️
description: Watch this video to learn how to make super cool giant bubbles with dish soap!
